Detailed Description

The reply to a WFActivationRequestPacket.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

WFActivationReplyPacket::WFActivationReplyPacket (  const WFActivationRequestPacket *  req,
WFResCodes::activation_res  resultCode,
const char *  rights,
uint32  ownerUIN,
const char *  server
) 
 

Parameters:
req The request.
resultCode What happened. OK or WRONG_ACTIVATION_CODE.
rights The rights for this activation as string.
ownerUIN The UIN of the owner of the activation 0 if not owned.
server The other instance this code belongs to.
